thread.title: BRIEF-Archos reports 9-month revenue up at 103.8 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Archos reports 9-month revenue up at 103.8 million euros

title: BRIEF-Archos reports 9-month revenue up at 103.8 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Archos reports 9-month revenue up at 103.8 million euros 
Oct 6 Archos SA : 
* 9-month revenue 103.8 million euros ($116.91 million) versus 84.0 million euros year ago 
* Q3 revenue 34.7 million euros versus 26.7 million euros year ago 
* Sees over 20 pct growth in FY 
* Aims to continue double digits growth and restore profitability as part of its 3 years strategic plan 
* Launches operator of network of connected objects called PicoWan Source text: bit.ly/1KY13ru Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8879 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
